thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Christopher Dezarn
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Christopher Dezarn

author: Christopher Dezarn
title: Christopher Dezarn
text: Choice Home Warranty was quick responding to our claim and setting up a repair tech. We had it diagnosed and a replacement part was ordered. The stove continued to have issues with heating and an error code displayed the next day. I followed up with Choice and they sent the repair tech to follow up. We got that corrected and everything is working now.
